title: Gut Rehabbed, Great Location!
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   "Gut rehabbed garden apartment (only 3 steps down) with:   -a new kitchen with stone countertops and stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher!  -a beautiful new bathroom!   -HWF!  -central heat / AC!  Located in a quiet, well managed 3-flat with coin-laundry, storage and a yard!  Great Avondale location (Belmont and Lawndale), offering easy acess to: the blue line, the highway, restaurants and shopping!  Please note: 1) Solid Credit (675) Required. 2) Cats considered; no dogs. 3) No smoking inside of the apartment. 4) August 1st lease start.  Call or text (847-347-3293) today; great places don't last long!  Raider Realty works all over the city, but our core areas are: Logan Square, Avondale and East Humboldt Park. "
